snippet: Kevin Foster had 24 points as visiting Santa Clara defeated George Mason to win the third and deciding game of the College Basketball Invitational Finals.
abstract: Santa Clara beats George Mason, 80-77, to win the third and deciding game of College Basketball Invitational Finals.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Foster had 24 points as visiting Santa Clara defeated George Mason to win the third and deciding game of the College Basketball Invitational Finals.

headline.seo: Santa Clara Holds On for College Basketball Invitational Finals
headline.main: Santa Clara Holds On for C.B.I. Title
